title: Add to Cart Button Not Functioning
description: The 'Add to Cart' button on product pages is not working as expected. When clicking the button, the product is not added to the cart.
reproduction_steps: Visit the product page of any item.
expected_result: After clicking the 'Add to Cart' button, the selected item should be added to the cart, when viewing the cart, the selected item should be there.
actual_result: After clicking the 'Add to cart' button, the product in the cart is not displayed, the cart is empty.
